attr.title: WORDSCOOP! With Gelato the Otter
attr.desc: Your goal is to find words by connecting adjacent, contiguous scoops! When the word is ready, click again on the last scoop to submit.
attr.inst: Purchase at itch.io https://whiskerfjords.itch.io/wordscoop-with-gelato-the-otter or on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/3797690/WordScoop_With_Gelato_the_Otter/ and copy the WordScoop.exe to the wordscoop folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase at [itch.io](https://whiskerfjords.itch.io/wordscoop-with-gelato-the-otter) or on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3797690/WordScoop_With_Gelato_the_Otter/) and copy the WordScoop.exe to the wordscoop folder.
